nodes.text: Beverly Blvd was a destination on the subtram in the Coruscant Underworld. It was listed on travel maps inside the subtram trains, along with Sunset, Valley Village, North Hollywood, Burbank, Lucasville, LAAC, Filoniville, Laurel Canyon, Couch House, Skinwalker, RGC, Letterman, Skywalker Ranch, Big Rock Ranch and Skinwalker Ranch.

Beverly Blvd was inserted onto a subtram map as an in-joke by the Star Wars: The Clone Wars production team along with the other destinations on the map, referencing the real-life thoroughfare Beverly Boulevard in Los Angeles, California.
